title: Tax Day 2022 Is Arriving: Here’s What to Know
sub_head: The individual income-tax filing deadline for most Americans is April 18
body:
The individual tax-filing deadline returns to its mid-April home this year after two years of delays spurred by the pandemic. Here’s what you need to know about the end of tax season.
For most Americans, the tax-filing deadline is April 18. It isn’t April 15 because of the Emancipation Day holiday in Washington, D.C., and the subsequent weekend. In Maine and Massachusetts, the deadline is April 19 because of the Patriots’ Day holiday.
